popularproducts.name: iPad 8
popularproducts.description: The iPad 8th generation features a 10.2-inch Retina display, A12 Bionic chip, and support for Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard.

popularproducts.name: iPad Air
popularproducts.description: The iPad Air features a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, A14 Bionic chip, and support for Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard.

popularproducts.name: iPad Pro
popularproducts.description: The iPad Pro features a 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, M2 chip, and support for Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.
